meta.title: About - Game of the Year
meta.description: Discover Game of the Year, the independent platform where every player votes for their game of the year. One voice = one vote.

hero.title: Game of the year
hero.subtitle: The platform where every player elects his game of the year

independence.title: A voice for all players
independence.intro: Game of the Year is an independent platform that puts the power back in the hands of players. Here, no closed jury or weighted votes: every registration counts as one voice, and every voice has the same weight.
independence.freedom: You are free to vote for the game that marked you the most this year, whether it's a AAA blockbuster or an unknown indie game. It's your experience that matters.
independence.community: Together, the gaming community decides which game truly deserves the title of Game of the Year.

proposal.title: Propose your games and categories
proposal.intro: Game of the Year is also your creativity. Every registered member can actively contribute to the platform:

games.title: Game proposals
games.description: You can propose up to 5 games you want to see in the competition. Before submitting, check via search that the game isn't already present.
games.validation: Each proposed game is subject to validation: it must have been released during the current year, and the provided image must meet our quality standards.

categories.title: Category proposals
categories.description: Think a category is missing? Propose one! Each member can suggest 1 custom category.
categories.validation: Proposed categories are also validated by our team to ensure their relevance.
categories.limit: A maximum of 20 categories will be selected for the final votes.

opening.title: Vote opening
opening.description: One month before Christmas, the voting phase officially opens. For each selected category, you can choose one game among the nominees.

reveal.title: The big reveal
reveal.description: One week before Christmas, the results will be revealed live. The game elected by the community will finally be known.
reveal.date: The exact date will be announced in advance so no one misses this event!

items.title: Independent
items.description: No industrial influence, no biased partnerships. Just players and their passion.

items.title: Democratic
items.description: One person = one vote. Your opinion matters as much as anyone else's.

items.title: Transparent
items.description: Rules are clear, validation processes are explained, and results are public.

items.title: Community-driven
items.description: You're not a spectator, you're an actor. Propose, vote, and celebrate together.

cta.title: Ready to make your voice heard?
cta.description: Join thousands of players and participate in electing the true Game of the Year.
